mapper.sql: STAFF_ID AS staffId, DEPARTMENT_ID AS departmentId, PERMISSION_ID AS permissionId
mapper.select: select DISTINCT STAFF_NAME from t_black_list a,t_staff b where a.STAFF_ID = b.STAFF_ID
select distinct DEPARTMENT_NAME from t_black_list a, t_department b where a.DEPARTMENT_ID = b.DEPARTMENT_ID
select distinct PERMISSION_NAME from t_black_list a, t_permission b where a.PERMISSION_ID = b.PERMISSION_ID
